title: Pset_UnitaryEquipmentTypeAirHandler
description:
Air handler unitary equipment type attributes.
Note that these attributes were formerly Pset_AirHandler prior to IFC2x2.

AirHandlerConstruction.title: AirHandlerConstruction
AirHandlerConstruction.description: Enumeration defining how the air handler might be fabricated.

AirHandlerFanCoilArrangement.title: AirHandlerFanCoilArrangement
AirHandlerFanCoilArrangement.description: Enumeration defining the arrangement of the supply air fan and the cooling coil.

DualDeck.title: DualDeck
DualDeck.description: Does the AirHandler have a dual deck? TRUE = Yes, FALSE = No.
